column5: If so can you do me a favor. Cant get a straight answer to as if the mapping that is included will cover the Minaki area. If you have one can you check to see if the mapping covers this area for depth contours. Thanks in advance.

Why dont u just go to a syore that sells them and scroll to the minaki arra,if its the lowrance mapping on the unit it will suck like on my hd 8,if u buy the unit buy a navionics chip to go with it,u wont be sorry,
